column2: Let's get back into *Sidetrack* and work with Riley so she can get out!
Okay, let's go!
You and Faber found the key? That's going to really help us! Launch *Sidetrack*.
Go to the desktop and click on the *Sidetrack* icon.
This key is going to come in so handy! Let's use it to see what's in the *Toolbox*!
Press the *Flip* button so we can see the *Sidetrack Toolbox*.

Ah. Now we can access the *Instructions* panel. It's the same as the icons on the front, just written in code.

See that? Someone spelled `jump` wrong, no wonder that *Instruction* doesn't work. The language has to be super exact. 

Pay attention to each letter and correct the spelling in the code. Then try running the level again!

See in the code where it says `riley.jumpp();`?

See how jump has two p's? There's only one *p* in jump!
Change it to say `riley.jump();` Then flip back over and press PLAY.
Awesome! That was scary, but thanks to you, I got through.
Looks like this level has another error, though! Two of them! We need to fix both of them.
Look at the *Instructions* code by flipping the app to the back.
Then look for *Instructions* that are spelled wrong or that don't match the other *Instructions*.
See where it says `riley.fooorward();`? Forward has way too many o's! Change it to `riley.forward();`

Oh, wait, there's another one. Do you see it? Code is case sensitive so that's always something to check.

It should be `riley.jump();` not `riley.Jump();`  See that? lower case j: `jump` not `Jump`    *=^.‿.^=*

More spelling errors! Whoever wrote these instructions must have been under pressure to get it done quickly!

It's important to remember that once I fix the errors, I'll still need to get the order of the *Instructions* right.

Well. I fixed the errors in the code, but I still need to be on my toes here about getting the order of the *Instructions* right.  

All of these details matter if I'm going to get to the exit! It's amazing how if I just pause I can see the way through. Deep!

Hmm, look carefully. There’s no way this set of *Instructions* could _ever_ finish this level.

But good news, click the *Flip*button, and you can type any *Instructions* you want!

This gives you more choice. You don’t have to just rearrange the ones you’re given anymore.
Flip to hack so you can edit the code for the *Instructions.*
Because this level has a *Pit*, you'll need to add at least one `jump` Instruction.
Delete one of the *Instructions* and replace it with `riley.jump();` See how that works?
Make sure when you're done that there are 8 *Instructions* total. No more, no less!

Hold on, Riley, Remember how my research files were missing a while ago? I think I see them!

Yes, that's totally the files I've been looking for. They're over near the *Exit*! How did they get in here? 

You said you saw strange activity in the System area, remember, Riley? I wonder how it's all connected!

Whoa, yes, I def remember that. That's why I went back into the System. I was trying to help you find your files. 

And well, here we are! How did the files...never mind, I'll just go snap them up right now!

Okay, I'm transmitting the files to you now. You should see them soon.

Hope they make it through okay. So many strange things going on in here!

Okay, whew! I'm receiving them now. Wow, thanks Riley! You're the best! I really can use these files right now! 

So weird though. I wonder how they got in there?

^ = ^ prhhzzhhhrrr  //\\ 
Prhzzhhhhzzhhhhrrrrrrrrr //\\  
myaaaaaoo ^ = ^
Whoa, wait a minute! How's Riley gonna get past a solid column of *Walls* like that?
A solid *Wall*! Let's see how we can get past this one! Would love to get out some day soon!

I have an idea to get past that wall. We can try out an obscure *Instruction* I recall from my missing research. 

Come meet me in the Clubhouse and we'll go track it down together.
Come back whenever you're feeling up for it!
